frameDefinitions: An Object with an understood function is or is not in a state ready to perform that function.
An Experiencer has an easy or difficult time carrying out an Activity.
An Entity aids in the successful completion of a Purpose.
Through use, a Resource is diminished in quality or quantity (up to complete attrition) such that it becomes less capable of sustaining future use.
This frame concerns an Evaluee being judged for its quality, i.e. how much it would probably be liked.
An organic item, the Patient, has undergone the natural process of rotting  and decaying with a possible expression of the Degree to which the rotting has occurred.
frameExamples: A box is an <t>ideal</t> storage device.
My entire life savings is <t>depleted</t> due to university and medical bills.
listRoleDefinitions: The entity with an understood purpose.

This Frame Element marks expressions indicating the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> finds difficult or easy. In many cases, the relevant <fen>Activity</fen> has to be inferred from the context.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate which person judges carrying out the <fen>Activity</fen> to be easy or difficult.
The time at which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes place.
The item which is useful for some purpose.
The kind of task which is promoted by the use or presence of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
When the <fen>Entity</fen> is useful for a <fen>Purpose</fen>.
The <fen>Resource</fen> is a physical entity or an ability to perform work that was used in an earlier process, typically in pursuit of a goal.
The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged for its quality.
This role marks expressions that denote a scalar property of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged.
The <fen>Patient</fen> is the organic matter that has decayed.
listRoleExamples: The geology question on the exam was hard <fex>for me</fex>.
The Beaujolais Nouveau is dazzling <fex>in freshness</fex>.
